attributes.title: Itâ€™s a no for meâœ‹ğŸ˜”
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with everything my DeAr prEsidEnT puts out there...wrong, once I downloaded the app notifications popped up telling me that some pork pizza was at the door (pork is against my religion). I then open the door to tell them they have the wrong house, and then 5 men burst in and kick me to the ground and telling me that I have to vote Trump 2020. At this point Iâ€™m very appalled so I get up and run up the stairs to call the police, when someone gets on the phone they immediately tell me that they cannot help me if Iâ€™m a POC and the BLM movement is just a cult. I hang up to find the 5 men holding my dog over their knee getting ready to make a sacrifice to their â€œorange Cheeto puff president.â€ When I get ready to save my dog a 6th man comes in from the back and starts dropping bread crumbs on the floor with mice and bugs following him. When I go to get my phone to delete the app my phone zaps me and my phone had a little warning pop up that said â€œTrump, the only one...Trump 2020ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸.â€ The app then opens it self and plays music, a big orange button then shows up that says â€œpush me.â€ I did so, and the zoo broke down my house. As I stand on the sidewalk the 5 men come up to me and give me my dogâ€™s ashes, but then kick her ashes out of my hand and roundhouse me in the face and say â€œvote trump 2020 or else...â€ When I felt so confused the sky turned orange and Cheetos fell from the sky, a monkey from the zoo that broke my house came up to me and kicked me YET AGAIN, and then said very incoherently â€œChUm 2020!â€ I grab my phone so fast and delete the app , and then everything went back to normal besides my dogâ€™s ashes that spelt out â€œTrump 2020!!!â€  So all in all DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP; THIS HAPPENED TO ME AND I WAS KICKED THREE TIMES, SO FOR YOUR SAFETY DONâ€™T DOWNLOAD THE APP!!!
